name: Drupadi Persecution
description: Dursasana, who felt that he had won, forced Drupadi to take off her clothes in public. Drupadi in her confusion pleaded with the Gods who immediately gave her a miracle cloth to protect her honor. The cloth could not be undressed no matter how hard Dursasana tried to unwrapped Drupadi, not even with the help of his other Kurawa family member.
